about.title: Our Story
about.description: EGEOD (Expert of Geospatial and Earth Observation Data) was born in 2025 from a passion for cutting-edge technologies and the conviction that big data and geospatial data have the power to sustainably transform our world.
about.mission: From its creation, the company has set itself a clear mission: to design innovative tools and solutions to meet the major environmental, economic and societal challenges of our time.
about.journey: Our adventure began with a certainty: Earth observation and intelligent data analysis are essential levers for understanding a constantly evolving world and providing concrete and impactful responses.
about.recognition: Since then, EGEOD has established itself as a trusted player, recognized for its technical expertise and proximity to its partners.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: The true strength of EGEOD lies in its multidisciplinary team: data, geoscience and innovation enthusiasts, united by a common ambition â€“ transforming raw data into strategic levers for our partners.
team.commitment: Each project is driven by the complementarity of profiles and the desire to explore new perspectives, always with the same requirement: to offer solutions that are both efficient, sustainable and adapted to real field challenges.

innovation.title: Innovation

collaboration.title: Collaboration

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: At EGEOD, we believe in a world where geospatial data becomes a driver of sustainable development and territorial intelligence. Our ambition is to democratize access to this data and transform it into concrete solutions, capable of providing clear answers to the major environmental and societal challenges of tomorrow.
vision.future: Thanks to our expertise and innovations, we work for a future where space technology and Earth observation are essential levers for strategic decision-making and the preservation of our planet.
